TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_hekal, title = hekal, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/hekal} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam: ) maudad i hekal. . atahekal (kamu nu hulam: ) makabasu kaku atahekal midang. . patahekal (kamu nu hulam: ) patahekal tu kalisiw sapicakay tu kuhi. . patahekalay (kamu nu hulam: ) ci Imi ku patahekalay tu kalisiw. Imi . patahekalen (kamu nu hulam: ) patahekalen ku asu'ay a heci nu kilang! patahekalen kiya asu'ay kakanen! patahekalen niza ku pada mipawali! tahekal (kamu nu hulam: ) nanu makayza i wali tahekal kiya cilal. . pulungen nu mita pahanhan a tahekal. . nuhekal (kamu nu hulam: ) nuhekal a satabu kina dawa. . nuhekalan (kamu nu hulam: ) nuhekalan ku kebutulay a zikuc i kasienawan. . nuhekalan (kamu nu hulam: ) amana kau nuhekalan dada' ku pisakakawaw. . sakihekal (kamu nu hulam: ) caluken ku sakihekal a zikuc! sapatahekal (kamu nu hulam: ) pinaenta ku sapatahekal tu nubu i cinizaan? katahekal (kamu nu hulam: ) katahekal miazih tu bunac. . katahekalan (kamu nu hulam: ) katahekalan kina zazan a tayza i umah. . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
